plot: This film tells the story of Japan's history. Directed by Yoshimitsu Banno, with Akira Ifukube doing the score, this film was shown at the 1970 Japan Expo.
title: Birth of the Japanese Islands
plot_es: This film tells the story of Japan's history. Directed by Yoshimitsu Banno, with Akira Ifukube doing the score, this film was shown at the 1970 Japan Expo.
plot_en: This film tells the story of Japan's history. Directed by Yoshimitsu Banno, with Akira Ifukube doing the score, this film was shown at the 1970 Japan Expo.
